title: Pigs in a Blanket
method: Step 1: Gather all ingredients and preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Step 2: Shape biscuit dough sections into 3-inch diameter circles. Lay a slice of cheese on each dough circle; place a frankfurter in the center of each cheese slice and roll it up.
Step 3: Place rolls, seam-side down, on a cookie sheet.
Step 4: Bake in the preheated oven until biscuits are golden brown, about 10 to 15 minutes.
